unnormalised: Hey guys, training regimens are key, no? Even in gully cricket! Remember Rahul Dravid's dedication? Dr. Sharma at NIS Patiala advocates personalized plans. Someone training for the Mumbai marathon needs a different approach than someone building muscle in a 1000 sq ft gym in Chembur. Plus, diet! Gotta fuel up with more than just Rs. 20 samosas after those 10 km runs!
